org.activebpel.rt.message
Interface IAeMessageData

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeEmptyMessage, AeMessageData
public interface IAeMessageData
extends java.lang.Cloneable

Interface describing the message data associated with a variable of type message.

Method Summary
 void clearDirty()
          Clears the flag indicating that the data is dirty.
 java.lang.Object clone()
          Makes a deep copy of the part data
 IAeAttachmentContainer getAttachmentContainer()
          Returns an attachment container associated with the message, if any.
 java.lang.Object getData(java.lang.String aPartName)
          Returns the data associated with a passed part.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getMessageType()
          Returns the type of message this data is representing.
 int getPartCount()
          Returns the number of parts in this message data
 java.util.Iterator getPartNames()
          Returns an iterator over the part names for which we are storing data.
 boolean hasAttachments()
          Returns true if there are attachments associated with this MessageData object.
 boolean isDirty()
          Returns flag indicating if the message data is dirty.
 void setAttachmentContainer(IAeAttachmentContainer aAttachmentContainer)
          associates an optional attachment container to the message.
 void setData(java.lang.String aPartName, java.lang.Object aData)
          Sets the data associated with a passed part.
 

Method Detail

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()
Returns flag indicating if the message data is dirty.

clearDirty

public void clearDirty()
Clears the flag indicating that the data is dirty.

getMessageType

public javax.xml.namespace.QName getMessageType()
Returns the type of message this data is representing.

getPartNames

public java.util.Iterator getPartNames()
Returns an iterator over the part names for which we are storing data.

getData

public java.lang.Object getData(java.lang.String aPartName)
Returns the data associated with a passed part. Null if none.

Parameters:
aPartName - The part name to get data for.
Returns:
The data associated with the passed part name. Can be null.

setData

public void setData(java.lang.String aPartName,
                    java.lang.Object aData)
Sets the data associated with a passed part. Data can be null.

Parameters:
aPartName - The part to set the data for.
aData - The data to which the part is set.

clone

public java.lang.Object clone()
Makes a deep copy of the part data

getPartCount

public int getPartCount()
Returns the number of parts in this message data

hasAttachments

public boolean hasAttachments()
Returns true if there are attachments associated with this MessageData object.

getAttachmentContainer

public IAeAttachmentContainer getAttachmentContainer()
Returns an attachment container associated with the message, if any.

Returns:
the attachment container
